column1: ICYMI, my new #RealityChek post argues that today's report on US #GDP isn't important for showing #CCPVirus-produced damage. Instead, its main message concerns insights into the economy's future: https://alantonelson.wordpress.com/2020/04/29/whats-left-of-our-economy-through-the-looking-glass-with-the-new-us-gdp-report/ #economy #WuhanVirus #coronavirus #COVID19 #recession2020
